name: reactor-arianee
description: Packaged Reactor script to integrate with Arianee.

scripts.deploy_reactor: rm bundle.zip; zip bundle.zip main.js package.json; curl -i -H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" -H "Authorization: `cat access_key.secret | head -n1`"  -X PUT 'https://api.evrythng.com/projects/U9N5FqWAxnEyQRc7mRHNydXm/applications/U9NKFrrnRgkYEAfWpHc8ErUe/reactor/script' -F file=@./bundle.zip

author: EVRYTHNG
